UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides from Porcine Blood Cruor Hydrolysates as a Promising Source of Antifungal Activity
Literature.Author: García-Vela S, Cournoyer A, Sánchez-Reinoso Z, Bazinet L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MP4100(no activity data),Listeria ivanovii HPB 28(no activity data),Rhodotorula mucilaginosa 27173(MIC=39µM),Rhodotorula mucilaginosa 27173(MFC=78µM),Paecilomyces spp. 5332-9a(MIC=9µM),Paecilomyces spp. 5332-9a(MFC=9µM),Candida guilliermondii(MIC=312µM),Candida guilliermondii(MFC=625µM),Candida parapsilosis(no activity data),Debaryomyces hansenii(MIC=156µM),Debaryomyces hansenii(MFC=156µM),Aspergillus versicolor LMA 370(MIC=39µM),Aspergillus versicolor LMA 370(MFC=78µM),Aspergillus niger ATCC 1015(no activity data),Penicillium commune(MIC=312µM),Penicillium commune(MFC=312µM),Penicillium chrysogenum LMA 212(MIC=312µM),Eurotium rubrum(MIC=39µM),Eurotium rubrum(MFC=78µM),Mucor racemosus LMA 722(MIC=312µM),Mucor racemosus LMA 722(MFC=312µM)
